The <nowiki>[[SecurityTeam|Security Team]]</nowiki> weekly reports are intended to be very short summaries of the Security Team's weekly activities. 

If you would like to reach the Security Team, you can find us at the #ubuntu-hardened channel on FreeNode. For more ways to contact the Ubuntu Security Team, please view the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/Contacts|Contacts]]</nowiki> page.

Please review the links (below) for the report for a given date.
